text: Carmelo Pujia (5 October 1927 â€“ 8 January 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Christian Democracy party. He was president of the Province of Catanzaro from 1970 to 1975 and in the Chamber of Deputies from 1983 to 1994. He was born in Polia, Italy. Pujia died in Rome, Italy on 8 January 2022, at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Calabria
title: Carmelo Pujia (politician)
